instruction: Today's assessment of Hypertension: Last few readings have been stable.

instruction: Patient is monitoring blood pressure at home regularly, sometimes forgets due to hectic work schedule. No muscle aches from atorvastatin, feels tired possibly due to work stress.

attributes.narrative: Patient is monitoring blood pressure at home regularly, sometimes forgets due to hectic work schedule. No muscle aches from atorvastatin, feels tired possibly due to work stress.
